thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 05 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Morguard Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Normal Course Issuer Bid

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Morguard Real Estate Investment Trust Announces Normal Course Issuer Bid
text:
Morguard Real Estate Investment Trust:
* MORGUARD REAL ESTATE INVESTMENT TRUST ANNOUNCES NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID
* MORGUARD REIT - MORGUARD MAY, DURING TWELVE MONTH PERIOD COMMENCING FEB. 7, 2018 AND ENDING FEB. 6, 2019, PURCHASE FOR CANCELLATION UP TO 3 MILLION UNITS​
* MORGUARD REIT - ‍ADDITIONALLY, CO MAY PURCHASE FOR CANCELLATION UP TO $11.5 MILLION 4.50% CONVERTIBLE UNSECURED SUBORDINATED DEBENTURES DUE DEC. 31, 2021​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
